title: Can recommend me a mobile phone supports 5G and has a strong processor please and big screen at the same time? - Quora

response.answer_text: LG V60 ThinQ 5G. I have one. It support 5G NR. It has a Qualcomm Snapdragon 865, same as the Samsung Galaxy S20 models in North America (which also runs faster and cooler than the Exynos chipset in the rest of the world's Galaxy S20 models), it's absolutely massive; it's as big as a Galaxy Note; it's only $900 in the US. Oh, and it includes a Dual Screen Accessory so you get TWO big-ass screens with a fancy phone case.  And trust me, that hand there is not small.
I have an LG V60 thinq that is fast, relatively inexpensive for the quality, large screen and a case with a second screen - bonus! LG V60 ThinQ 5G Dual Screen Smartphone - Buy Now
